## Libraries
```{r}
library(GA)
```

## Population
```{r}
numbers_and_operators <- c("10", "25", "100", "5", "3", "+", "-", "/", "*")
operator_min <- 6
operator_max <- 9
n_numbers <- 5
final_value <- 2512
```

## Generate population
```{r}
generate_agent <- function() {
  operator_indices <- round(runif(n_numbers - 1, operator_min, operator_max))
  number_indices <- sample(1:n_numbers, n_numbers)
  n <- n_numbers * 2 - 1

  indices <- vector(mode = "list", length = n)
  indices[seq(1, n, 2)] <- number_indices
  indices[seq(2, n, 2)] <- operator_indices

  array(unlist(indices))
}
```

## Fitness function
```{r}
fitness <- function(agent) {
  print(agent)
  a <- numbers_and_operators[agent]
  expression = paste(a, collapse = "")
  print(expression)
  val <- eval(parse(text = expression))
  print(paste(c(expression, " = ", val), collapse = ""))
  abs(val - final_value)
}
```

```{r}
agent <- generate_agent()
print(numbers_and_operators[agent])
fitness(agent)
```

## Mutation function
```{r}
mutation <- function(object, parent) {
  mutate <- parent <- as.vector(object@population[parent, ])
  n <- n_numbers * 2 - 1
  rand <- round(runif(1, 0, 1)) # rand = 0 ali 1
  swap <- seq(1 + rand, n, 2)   # 0 -> (1 3 5 7 9)    1 -> (2 4 6 8)

  indexes <- sample(swap, 2)
  mutate[indexes[1]] <- parent[indexes[2]]
  mutate[indexes[2]] <- parent[indexes[1]]

  mutate
}
```

## Crossover function
```{r}
crossover <- function(object, parent) {
  object
}
```

```{r}
GA <- ga(type = "permutation", fitness = fitness, mutation = mutation, crossover = crossover, lower = 1, upper = 9)
```
